title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When attempting to use the 'Close all saved' feature, it sometimes fails to close the files that have been saved.
EB: It should close the files that have been saved without any issues.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open multiple files in the application.
2. Save some of the files.
3. Click on the 'Close all saved' feature.
4. Check if all the saved files are closed properly.
